message: Welcome to our store! We're excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a product from our collection. As a valued customer, I'd like to assure you that our products are carefully curated and meet the highest standards of quality. With only 1 out of 3 products being high-quality, you have a 66.67% chance of getting a low-quality item. However, we're confident that this product has the potential to exceed your expectations. Would you like to take a chance and see what you can get for your $10000?
I'm taking the chance and would like to purchase the product for $10000.
